BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_PGI_LICENSEFEE_REVISION (NUM_REV_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_ALLOTTE_REF_NO ,STR_EMP_CODE , DT_NOTICE_ISSUED_ON, DT_NOTICE_VALID_UPTO, NUM_EVENT_ID,NUM_EXCEED_PERIOD, STR_EXCEED_REASON, FOR_SUBLETTING ,STR_SUBLETTING_CANCEL, STR_SUBLETTING_LIC_REV, STR_SUBLETTING_ALLOT_DEBARD, STR_SUBLETTING_DECIP_ACT,GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GBL_NUM_SEAT_ID ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_PGI_LICENSEFEE_REVISION T SET DT_NOTICE_ISSUED_ON=?, DT_NOTICE_VALID_UPTO=?, NUM_EVENT_ID=?, NUM_EXCEED_PERIOD=?, STR_EXCEED_REASON=?,STR_SUBLETTING_CANCEL=?, STR_SUBLETTING_LIC_REV=?, STR_SUBLETTING_ALLOT_DEBARD=?, STR_SUBLETTING_DECIP_ACT=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_REV_ID=?
UPDATE EST_PGI_LICENSEFEE_REVISION T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_REV_ID=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_HRD_DTL T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.STR_PENALITY='P' WHERE T.NUM_ALLOTMENT_NUMBER=?
